A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars!! Rain Johnson did a phenomenal job. Great story and cinematography. Standouts are Driver and Ridley. Really wish they toned down the 'fan-service\" though. I think they thought they were Marvel for a second. However the epic moments and plot twists are able to overcome all of the Marvel Shenanigans. Still one of the best Star Wars movies to date.
